message: Let's be fair and split the money. I propose taking a slightly larger share considering the inflation disadvantage I have.
Your offer was a bit unfair considering the inflation. I need a bit more to make it worthwhile for me to accept now.
Bob, this is a better deal than you'll get in the next round. The value for both of us decreases with each round, so let's settle this now.
Alice, the clock is ticking and we're both losing out because of the inflation. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
